title: how do i take a summoners name?
body: this bloke has had the name i want for 3-4 seasons now and has played like 20 games in total over the 3-4 seasons. how do i get his name? ill pay him.

replies.body:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914-Summoner-Name-Clean-Up-

> * Each Summoner name will have 6 months of inactivity protection upon creation.
* Each Summoner name will earn an additional month of inactivity protection for each Summoner level above 6, up to 30 months.
* Inactivity is defined to be a period in which no games of any kind have been played on the account.
* When inactivity protection expires, the name will be available to be claimed through the Summoner name Change service in the store.
so they are lvl 30 and played a game this month... so does that mean they are protected for 30months from that game?
